text: Ila anu: "Allah tana dasula koraku srstincina vastralankarananu mariyu manci jivanopadhini nisedhincevadevadu?" (Inka) ila anu: "Ivi ihaloka jivitanlo visvasula korake; punarut'thana dinamuna pratyakanga vari koraku matrame galavu. I vidhanga memu ma sucanalanu jnanam gala variki spastanga vivaristunnamu
